alert.note: Alert for Carver; Dakota; Hennepin; Scott (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 10:32AM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River Above Springfield affecting Brown County. Minnesota River at Morton affecting Redwood and Renville Counties. Minnesota River at Montevideo affecting Chippewa, Yellow Medicine and Lac qui Parle Counties. Minnesota River near Jordan affecting Sibley, Scott and Carver Counties. Minnesota River at Henderson MN19 affecting Le Sueur, Sibley and Scott Counties. Minnesota River at Savage affecting Hennepin, Dakota, Scott and Carver Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Cottonwood River at New Ulm affecting Brown County. Minnesota River at New Ulm affecting Brown, Nicollet and Blue Earth Counties. Minnesota River at Mankato affecting Nicollet and Blue Earth Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Minnesota River at Savage. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1000 AM CDT Tuesday, the stage was 700.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 708.4 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 702.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
